data.message: What does Em have to do with this project? Acting, soundtrack??

replies.message: i think this is the only comment relevant to the post lol
He's not in the cast so he must have a song in it. http://m.imdb.com/title/tt0455944/
says #equalizer so im guessing he did a theme song for it? i hope so
Most probably the soundtrack, definitely not acting in this movie, he had no time
ugh, how sad. im lookin' at the inverted E. Hopin' that he's one of the characters. or even the main ACTOR :( and i thought the man standing in the picture was him. He looks so :(
